channel.title: Help with jar
channel.description: Hey, I forgot how to use JAR maker, so I tried to. I made the jar by putting the output as client.jar input as (folder) on my desktop. I left the manifest blank. I signed it and etc. But i tried to use the client.jar, but it said "Failed to load Main-Class manifest attribute from C:\Users\(user)\desktop\client.jar." But I don't know what to put in the manifest thing. Please help!

item.title: Help with jar
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Hey, I forgot how to use JAR maker, so I tried to.
I made the jar by putting the output as client.jar input as (folder) on my desktop.
I left the manifest blank.
I signed it and etc.
But i tried to use the client.jar, but it said “Failed to load Main-Class manifest attribute from C:\Users(user)\desktop\client.jar.”
But I don’t know what to put in the manifest thing.
Please help!

Read full topic
